newsArray.title: Левски привиква петима за нови договори през лятото
newsArray.description: Джавад Ел Джемили също ще бъде привикан от ръководството на Левски с предложение за нов договор. „Мач Телеграф“ пише, че от „Герена“ няма да чакат до зимата и още отсега започват преговори с петима играчи за нови договори. Причината е, че настоящите им изтичат през следващото лято, а „син...

newsArray.title: Real-Barça: Tebas assume l’absence de goal line technology en pointant ses nombreuses erreurs
newsArray.description: Javier Tebas, président de la Ligue de football espagnol, assumé l’absence de goal line technology en Liga qui a provoqué une grosse polémique lors de Real-Barça (3-2), dimanche. Selon lui, le système est perfectible.

newsArray.title: Khan stands firm
creator: Nitesh Raniga
newsArray.description: The Flick Suva Football Association Acting President, Intiyaz Khan says the current management will not be stepping down any time soon. Khan reveals this during a press conference in Nabua this afternoon and says they’ve been giving their all in the running of Suva FC. He adds they will not be changing anything but rather […]

newsArray.title: Liverpool keep title bid alive as Forest fume
newsArray.description: FOOTBALL: Liverpool got back on track after a miserable week as a 3-1 win at Fulham kept their Premier League title bid alive, while Nottingham Forest launched an astonishing rant at the officiating in their 2-0 defeat against Everton yesterday (Apr 21).

newsArray.title: Action sorgt für Kopfschütteln und Gelächter!
newsArray.description: Sheffield (England) – Dave Newton starb am 20. März im Alter von 81 Jahren. Vor seinem Tod identifizierte sich der Mann Großbritannien Gedanken zu seiner Beerdigung. Sein Schwiegersohn erfüllte ihm seinen letzten Wunsch. Dave Newton (†81) war ein fröhlicher Mensch und machte allen Spaß. © Screenshot/X/@philcooper15 Phil Cooper dachte lange, dass der Vater seiner Frau …
